io.honeycomb.libhoney.HoneyClient

  • Packages that use HoneyClient 
    Package Description
    io.honeycomb.libhoney
    Classes that define the public API; see the 'examples' module for simple use-cases.

      Static method to obtain an instance of HoneyClient.
